text: (thveu dau che neah) ku daembi aoy puok aah li kitea b doeng tha pitabrakd nasa puokke kmean samotthaphap leu aveimuoy ampi kar braosa bratan robsa a l laoh laey . haey pitabrakd nasa kar braosa bratan noh ku nowknong kandabdai robsa a l laoh del trong nung bratan vea aoy anak na del trong mean chetnea . haey a l laoh meankar braosa bratan da thomtheng
